In this article I'm going to show you how to build a simple chatbot with Python and the
OpenAI's GPT-3 engine. GPT-3 and other chatbots based on the same technology have
experience in text application (they are able to understand and produce text, just like a human
being), but they don't require to "learn" the meaning of anything, they are just great at
processing tons of data stored in their massive neural networks. GPT-3 is a great example of
this kind of AI and in this tutorial we are going to leverage it by integrating it with WhatsApp
using the Twilio API for WhatsApp.
